price: A ako ih zapitaš ko ih je stvorio, sigurno će reći: “Allah!” Pa kuda se, onda, odmeću?!
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَهُمۡ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqahum layaqūlunna al-lahu fa-annā yu'fakūna
